amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would raise taxes on veterans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 697 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 697 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 68.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 697.
Amendment SA 697 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Burr.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 697 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 54. Record Vote Number: 68.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 697 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Burr.
